snippet.title: Making the game of my dreams from scratch as a beginner solodev!
snippet.description:
I am making a game solo! I have worked already for about 1 year on it in my free time for a total of more than 2.5K hours of game dev.  

I am doing almost everything on it except the sound and music! It is an extraordinary experience and I am very glad to share with you this new trailer for the game. 

The game is a stealth-action-adventure game in which you will live a passionate experience! I am willing to bring to you the best game I can do, full of new gameplay ideas, soothing environments, and incredible stories.

If you are interested in videos about game making, let me know in the comments and I could start a little series about that! I love sharing this experience.
